body_html:
Hi @ChuangLee
we use predict mode for exporting serving graph. providing labels to the model_fn in predict mode seems breaking the assumptions.
You can still have labels in your network by adding them to features dictionary. Does that work?
body_text:
Hi @ChuangLee
we use predict mode for exporting serving graph. providing labels to the model_fn in predict mode seems breaking the assumptions.
You can still have labels in your network by adding them to features dictionary. Does that work?
body:
Hi @ChuangLee 
we use predict mode for exporting serving graph. providing labels to the `model_fn` in predict mode seems breaking the assumptions.
You can still have `labels` in your network by adding them to `features` dictionary. Does that work?
